edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries
Class CommonArgument

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries.CommonArgument

public class CommonArgument
extends java.lang.Object

A CommonArgument defines a record displayed on the common argument display.

Author:
jburge

incrementFor

public void incrementFor()
Increments the for count. This is a bit tricky since the counts are currently stored as strings... The total count is incremented too.

incrementAgainst

public void incrementAgainst()
Increments the against count. A bit tricky since counts are stored as strings. The total count is incremented too.
